post.body: Oh yeah I was raving about that one when I heard it, too! Great episode.
Yay!
that sounds like my last week! High five.
Exactly! I'm not looking for plot or anything! It'll be fun to watch.
to @dkr "I don't think you and I should be invited to the same parties."
When all I buy at the grocery store is cheese, is it any wonder all I eat is mac 'n cheese and grilled cheese sandwiches?
All grumpy and pouty; I was excited for a fun little project that shouldn't have been that difficult. :(
All the tutorials are way too complicated for what I want to do. Delete, quit, go read a book.
Trying to follow a django tutorial, but I'm not a programmer. Listening to Django Reinhardt as I go isn't helping, either.
Slept til noon, now for a pedicure. This is how I Sunday, folks :)
A couple people backed out of seeing The Spirit tonight - guess they read the reviews. I still wanna see it on the big screen!
Slept for eleven hours again. I'll go ahead and blame it on these allergy pills.
Who wants to go see The Spirit tomorrow evening? Pacific Place, 8pm?
We were watching Don't Forget the Lyrics, then decided to fire up a game of Riff!
New Year's resolutions: 1. Get a valid I.D. 2. Take burlesque dance classes 3. Stop using credit cards
We just cheers'ed to Turducken and then my glass broke.
"He's a really nice guy... He just likes Dave Matthews."
Holy crap!
Having a fun day :) Happy Christmas!
Playing Fable II with my own Christmas soundtrack â€” it's tough getting the audio mix right, but I'm a nerd.
